trans-unit.source: Uses the object security layer of the managed ACL library to wrap access control functionality for directory objects.
trans-unit.target: Bruker objektet sikkerhetslaget av det behandlede biblioteket tilgangskontrolliste (ACL) til å utføre access control-funksjonalitet for katalogobjekter.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Type> object that represents an access right for this object.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref:System.Type>objektet som representerer tilgang for dette objektet.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: This property always returns the <xref:System.Type> of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryRights> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer alltid den <xref:System.Type>av den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryRights>opplisting.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryRights> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the access right.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>for tilgang til høyre.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"></xref> object with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"> </xref> objekt med de angitte verdiene.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object such as an NTAccount object that resolves to a security identifier (SID).
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref> objektet som et NTAccount-objekt som løses til en sikkerhetsidentifikatoren (SID).

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> bitmask that shows the access privileges to use.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>bitmaske som viser tilgangsrettigheter til å bruke.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> object that indicates whether ACEs are inherited.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Boolean>objekt som angir om tilgangskontrolloppføringer arves.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if ACEs are inherited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tilgangskontrolloppføringer arves; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"></xref> object that contains inheritance flags on a directory object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"> </xref> objekt som inneholder arveflagg for et katalogobjekt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags"></xref> object that contains inheritance propagation flags on a directory object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags"> </xref> objekt som inneholder arv overføring flagg for et katalogobjekt.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> object that contains the ACE type.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"> </xref> objekt som inneholder TILGANGSKONTROLLISTEN-type.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"></xref> that corresponds to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"> </xref> som tilsvarer det <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"></xref> object with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"> </xref> objekt med de angitte verdiene.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object, such as an NTAccount object, that resolves to a security identifier (SID).
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref> objekt, for eksempel et NTAccount-objekt som løses til en sikkerhetsidentifikatoren (SID).

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> bitmask that shows the access privileges to use.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>bitmaske som viser tilgangsrettigheter til å bruke.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> object that indicates if ACEs are inherited.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Boolean>objekt som angir om tilgangskontrolloppføringer arves.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true " name="true " href=""></xref>if ACEs are inherited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true " name="true " href=""></xref>Hvis tilgangskontrolloppføringer arves; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"></xref> object that contains inheritance flags for a directory object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"> </xref> objekt som inneholder arveflagg for et katalogobjekt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags"></xref> object that contains inheritance propagation flags for a directory object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags"> </xref> objekt som inneholder arv overføring flagg for et katalogobjekt.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> object that contains the ACE type.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"> </xref> objekt som inneholder TILGANGSKONTROLLISTEN-type.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> object that contains the GUID of the directory object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Guid>objekt som inneholder GUIDEN for directory-objekt.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> object that contains the GUID of the inherited directory object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Guid>objekt som inneholder GUIDEN for arvede directory-objekt.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"></xref> that corresponds to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"> </xref> som tilsvarer det <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Type> that represents an access rule for this object.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref:System.Type>som representerer en tilgangsregel for dette objektet.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: This property always returns the <xref:System.Type> of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer alltid den <xref:System.Type>av <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule>klasse.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>av tilgangsregelen.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Adds an access rule to the DACL of an object.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en tilgangsregel DACL for et objekt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity.AddAccessRule*> object to which this operation applies.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity.AddAccessRule*>objekt som gjelder for denne operasjonen.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity.AddAccessRule*>

trans-unit.source: Adds an audit rule to the SACL of an object.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en regel for sporing av endringer i SACL til et objekt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAuditRule"></xref> object to which this operation applies.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAuditRule"> </xref> objekt som gjelder for denne operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule"></xref> object with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule"> </xref> objekt med de angitte verdiene.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object such as an NTAccount object, that resolves to a security identifier (SID).
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref> objektet som et NTAccount-objekt som løses til en sikkerhetsidentifikatoren (SID).

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> bitmask that shows the access privileges to use.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>bitmaske som viser tilgangsrettigheter til å bruke.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Boolean>objekt som angir om tilgangskontrolloppføringer arves.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if ACEs are inherited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tilgangskontrolloppføringer arves; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags"> </xref> objekt som inneholder arv overføring flagg for et katalogobjekt.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags"></xref> object that contains the audit flags for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags"> </xref> objekt som inneholder audit flagg for denne <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule"></xref> that corresponds to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule"> </xref> som tilsvarer det <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule"></xref> object with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule"> </xref> objekt med de angitte verdiene.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object such as an NTAccount object that resolves to a security identifier (SID).
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref> objektet som et NTAccount-objekt som løses til en sikkerhetsidentifikatoren (SID).

trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Boolean>objekt som angir om tilgangskontrolloppføringer arves.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tilgangskontrolloppføringer arves; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"> </xref> objekt som inneholder arveflagg for et katalogobjekt.

trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags"> </xref> objekt som inneholder arv overføring flagg for et katalogobjekt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> object that contains the Guido of the directory object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Guid>objekt som inneholder Guido på mappeobjektet.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> object that contains the Guido of the inherited directory object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Guid>objekt som inneholder Guido for arvede directory-objektet.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule"></xref> that corresponds to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule"> </xref> som tilsvarer det <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Type> that represents an audit rule for this object.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref:System.Type>som representerer en regel for sporing av endringer for dette objektet.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: This property always returns the <xref:System.Type> of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAuditRule> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer alltid den <xref:System.Type>av <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAuditRule>klasse.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAuditRule> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the audit rule.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>for regelen audit.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified modification to the specified <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gjelder den angitte endringen til den angitte <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The type of access control modification to perform.
trans-unit.target: Typen access control redigering til å utføre.

trans-unit.source: The access rule to modify.
trans-unit.target: Tilgangsregel å endre.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if successfully modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis endret; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if successfully modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis endret; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified modification to the specified <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gjelder den angitte endringen til den angitte <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The modification to apply.
trans-unit.target: Endringen skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: The audit rule to modify.
trans-unit.target: Overvåk-regel for å endre.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if successfully modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis endret; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if successfully modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis endret; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes all access rules associated with the specified <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle tilgangsregler som er knyttet til den angitte <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> for which to remove all access rules.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref> som du vil fjerne alle tilgangsregler.

trans-unit.source: All access rules are not in canonical order.
trans-unit.target: Alle tilgangsregler er ikke godkjent rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: Removes all audit rules associated with the specified <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle audit reglene knyttet til den angitte <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> for which to remove all audit rules.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref> som du vil fjerne alle audit-regler.

trans-unit.source: All audit rules are not in canonical order.
trans-unit.target: Overvåk reglene er ikke godkjent rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: Removes all access rules that have the specified <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object and <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> object from the DACL of an object.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle tilgangsregler som har den angitte <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref> objekt og <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"> </xref> objektet fra DACL for et objekt.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object such as an NTAccount object, that resolves to a security identifier (SID).
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref> objektet som et NTAccount-objekt som løses til en sikkerhetsidentifikatoren (SID).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> object that contains the ACE type.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"> </xref> objekt som inneholder TILGANGSKONTROLLISTEN-type.

trans-unit.source: Removes all access rules that contain the same security identifier and access mask as the specified access rule from the DACL of an object.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle tilgangsregler som inneholder samme security-IDen og tilgang masken som angitt tilgangsregelen fra DACL for et objekt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"></xref> object to which this operation applies.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"> </xref> objekt som gjelder for denne operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the operation is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis operasjonen er fullført. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes all access rules that exactly match the specified access rule from the DACL of an object.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle tilgangsregler som er nøyaktig lik den angitte tilgangsregelen fra DACL for et objekt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"></xref> object to which this operation applies.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"> </xref> objekt som gjelder for denne operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Removes all audit rules that have the specified <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object from the SACL of an object.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner audit reglene som har den angitte <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref> objektet fra SACL til et objekt.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object such as an NTAccount object, that resolves to a security identifier (SID).
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref> objektet som et NTAccount-objekt som løses til en sikkerhetsidentifikatoren (SID).

trans-unit.source: Removes all audit rules that contain the same security identifier and access mask as the specified audit rule from the System Access Control List (SACL) of an object.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner audit reglene som inneholder samme security-IDen og tilgang masken som angitt audit regelen fra System Access Control listen (SACL) for et objekt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"></xref> object to which this operation applies.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"> </xref> objekt som gjelder for denne operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the operation is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis operasjonen er fullført. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes all audit rules that exactly match the specified audit rule from the SACL of an object.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle audit regler som samsvarer med den angitte audit regelen fra SACL til et objekt nøyaktig.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"></xref> object to which this operation applies.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"> </xref> objekt som gjelder for denne operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Searches an object's DACL for all access rules that contain a security identifier (SID) that matches the SID specified in the rule object, and replaces all of those access rules with the access rules that are contained in the rule object.
trans-unit.target: Søker objektets DACL for alle tilgangsregler som inneholder en sikkerhetsidentifikatoren (SID) som tilsvarer siden som er angitt i den rule objekt, og erstatter alle de tilgangsregler med tilgangsregler som finnes i den rule objektet.

trans-unit.source: When ResetAccessRule is used to replace all access rules with a particular SID in an object's DACL, both Allow- and Deny- type rules are replaced.
trans-unit.target: Når ResetAccessRule brukes til å erstatte alle tilgangsregler med en bestemt SID i et objekts DACL, erstattes begge Tillat og avslå Skriv reglene.

trans-unit.source: To replace only Allow rules without affecting Deny rules, or to replace Deny rules without affecting Allow rules, use <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity.SetAccessRule%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: Erstatt bare Tilgangsreglene uten å påvirke Deny regler eller erstatte Deny regler uten å påvirke Tilgangsreglene, bruker <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity.SetAccessRule%2A>i stedet.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity.SetAccessRule%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"></xref> object to which this operation applies.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"> </xref> objekt som gjelder for denne operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Searches an object's DACL for all access rules that contain a security identifier (SID) that matches the SID specified in the rule object, and an access control type (Allow or Deny) that matches the type specified in the rule object, and replaces all of those access rules with the access rules that are contained in the rule object.
trans-unit.target: Søker objektets DACL for alle tilgangsregler som inneholder en sikkerhetsidentifikatoren (SID) som tilsvarer siden som er angitt i den rule objekt, og en tilgang kontrolltypen (Tillat eller Nekt) som samsvarer med typen som er angitt i den rule objekt, og erstatter alle de tilgangsregler med tilgangsregler som finnes i den rule objektet.

trans-unit.source: When SetAccessRule is used to replace all access rules that match a particular SID and access control type (Allow or Deny) in an object's DACL, all rules in that DACL with an SID and type that match the SID and access control type contained in the `rule` object are replaced.
trans-unit.target: Når SetAccessRule brukes til å erstatte alle tilgangsregler som samsvarer med bestemte siden og få tilgang til kontrolltypen (Tillat eller Nekt) i et objekts DACL, alle regler i den DACL med en SID og type som samsvarer med SID og tilgang kontrollere type finnes i den `rule` objektet erstattes.

trans-unit.source: Using this method, the developer can replace any Allow rules for that SID on that object without affecting existing Deny rules, or replace all Deny rules for that SID on that object without affecting existing Allow rules.
trans-unit.target: Med denne metoden kan utvikleren erstatte alle Tilgangsreglene for denne siden på dette objektet uten å påvirke eksisterende regler som skal avslås, eller erstatte Deny reglene for denne siden på dette objektet uten å påvirke eksisterende Tilgangsreglene.

trans-unit.source: To replace all rules for that object pertaining to the specified SID, regardless of type, use <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity.ResetAccessRule%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil erstatte alle regler for objektet som er knyttet til den angitte SID, uavhengig av typen, kan du bruke <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity.ResetAccessRule%2A>i stedet.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity.ResetAccessRule%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"></xref> object to which this operation applies.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"> </xref> objekt som gjelder for denne operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Replaces all audit rules that contain the same security identifier as the specified audit rule in the SACL of an object with the specified audit rule.
trans-unit.target: Erstatter audit reglene som inneholder den samme sikkerhetsidentifikatoren som angitt audit regelen i SACL til et objekt med den angitte audit regelen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"></xref> object to which this operation applies.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"> </xref> objekt som gjelder for denne operasjonen.
